Name: Bunker Defense
About the game: Tower defense is back, and it's better than ever! MULTI-PLAYER You can play Bunker Defense with your friends in an online 2-4 player co-op mode. Combine the towers and abilities of different commanders for powerful combos! KEY FEATURES Bunker Defense is a tower defense game. Waves of enemies attack your base, and you must defend it by building different kinds of defense towers and cannons. A top-down strategy game. Suitable challenges are provided for all skill and equipment levels by different difficulty levels. Maze building without juggling! A single-player mode is included. An online multi-player co-op mode for 2-4 players is included. There are multiple different commanders for the player to choose from, each having their own defenses and abilities. Defenses and tactics can be improved with different abilities and items. Looting and crafting. Unlockable special defenses. Lots of different kinds of enemies. Boss fights! Decent graphics with a modern game engine. Lots of content. Contains both hand-crafted and generated levels. Lots of depth with different commanders and commander builds, different special enemies, different items, different strategies, resource management, etc. Great soundtrack!
